com.ethercis.ehr.util

Class RMDataSerializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ethercis.ehr.util.RMDataSerializer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class RMDataSerializer
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Marshal/unmarshal an extended RM composition Used to fast serialize the composition and pass it in messages Created by Christian Chevalley on 8/5/2014.
    See Also:
